title: Vegan Dukkan - Ecolife
description: Well-stocked, all-vegan mini market and health food shop in the city center, located on a side street opposite Taksim Emergency Hospital. Offers mostly organic products including fresh bread, spreads, raw food snacks, soya milk, oat and rice drinks, tofu, miso, wakame, cereals, gluten free food, bio coffee, chocolate, biscuits, juices, bio cosmetics and personal care products, ecological cleaning products, and supplements.
streetAddress: Siraselviler cad. Soganci Sokak 8/A, Cihangir Beyoglu
